about_the_game:
Herolike: An Unfortunate Isekai is a turn based RPG. It features linear story progression, side quests, hidden abilities and some NSFW scenes that are (mostly) optional. Go through 9 dungeons, collecting new friends who will join you in your adventure. Battle monsters and complete dungeons to progress.

There are a total of 8 companions to collect, including your pet dog or cat, and several pieces of armor and equipment to craft. There are hidden abilities scattered throughout the world waiting to be unlocked by the new hero of the land.

Meet our heroine:

She gets teleported to another world as the 'Chosen Hero.' After being transported to the new world, we find our hero is reluctant to do what she is told. She is a bit promiscuous, and tends to spend more time having dirty thoughts than caring about the world around her.

There are a total of 8 companions to collect, and several pieces of armor and equipment to craft. There are hidden abilities scattered throughout the world waiting to be unlocked by the hero as she finds them.

Once all is said and done, you must decide the fate of this world and choose if you will return home, or stay in the new land.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains sexual content including images of consenting intercourse, masturbation, sex toys, nudity, visual depiction of bodily fluids including semen. There are no depictions of non-consensual sex or defeat scenes.

legal_notice: This product is made using RPG Maker MV, and created by Corrupted Cookies LLC. All rights reserved.
name: Herolike; An Unfortunate Isekai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

steam_germany.descriptors:
Sexuelle Inhalte
Drastische Gewalt
Derbe Sprache

short_description: You are teleported to another world. Fight enemies, solve puzzles, engage in naughty behavior, craft equipment, and change your fate for the better. A casual game focused on light humor and character growth. The protagonist can't help herself, and somehow always finds something slutty to do.
